ygData.subject: How? Where?
ygData.msgSnippet: My smith is a Dark Elf, and I was wondering about smithing as a Dark Elf. have a skill of 24 in smithing. But since I am not able to go into E. Freeport which
ygData.messageBody:
My smith is a Dark Elf, and I was wondering about smithing as a Dark Elf.
have a skill of 24 in smithing. But since I am not able to go into E.
Freeport which seems to go the smithing capital of the world what am I
supposed to do about getting molds? Should I just start a good character or
something and go to Freeport? I would hate to do that, so if there is
anything that is possible in Neriak, or another evil town, would be greatly
appreciated. Not sure about Oggok or Grobb. Forget which molds are there. Any
information would be great, thanks.
